snippet.title: Windblown | Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1911610/Windblown  

Hold on to your hats, this one’s gonna get wild! 

Windblown is a lightning fast co-op action roguelite from the crafters of Dead Cells! Take on the role of a Leaper, and defend the Ark from a suuuuuper angry Vortex! Collect the memories of fallen warriors and unleash your fury on gorgeous procedurally generated sky-islands.

We hope you're ready to dash, die, and repeat again in single player, or with up to two friends in online co-op!

 
Follow us on Social:  
X: https://twitter.com/windblowngame  
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/windblowngame/  
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@windblowngame  
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/windblowngame/

Music by Danger 
 - YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@2emedanger 
 - Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/2emedanger/ 
 - Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/intl-fr/artist/2o3U0ld93tHYowkoari4Vi
